define: Use this api to get first mile waybill file.

error_list.name: firstmile.error_network
error_list.description: Get waybill fail due to the network error.

error_list.name: error_permission
error_list.description: Sorry you don't have the permission, detail: {msg}.

error_list.name: firstmile.error_param
error_list.description: The ShopID and Pickup Label are not matched.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no access_token in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no partner_id in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no sign in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"name":"first_mile_tracking_number_list","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"[\"CNF880344919515201212\"]","type":"string[]","description":"The first mile tracking number that you want to print waybill.limit [1, 50]","key":"CtDwwP"}],"response_params":[{"name":"waybill","type":"file","sample":"","description":"

The waybill file.

","key":"iMNinsX"}]}
